questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks has created an integration from its consumer website's Contact form to Salesforce. The integration creates a Contact in Salesforce for each form submission without storing it in the external system. The Contact is created on an Account named "Website" which represents Contacts that were generated from the website.

The integration has been in use for a while, and users are reporting slow performance when dealing with Contacts in Salesforce.

What should a consultant recommend to improve performance?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
C can't be used as there is nothing to connect to if the records aren't stored on the external system. B would help with ownership skew

choices.B: Use multiple Accounts to store the related records.

questions.question_text:
The Cloud Kicks marketing team purchased a marketing automation tool and is implementing a lead qualification process. The sales director provided key attributes and activity history of the ideal lead.

What should marketing do to improve the current process?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Not sure how "manually" is an improvement to anything.

choices.A: Create reports based on the sales metrics provided in the marketing automation tool and train marketing users to identify and qualify leads.
choices.C: Develop the Lead score and grade based on the information provided to automatically determine when a lead should become qualified.
choices.B: Develop the Lead score and grade based on the information provided automatically and manually determine when a lead should become qualified.
choices.D: Set up the marketing automation tool to send prospects to the sales director and ask sales reps to assist in the qualification process.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
The best way to meet Universal Containers' requirement using a workflow email is to create it on the opportunity using an HTML email template.

questions.question_text:
The shipping department at Universal Containers is responsible for sending product samples as part of the sales process. When an opportunity moves to the
`sampling` stage, Universal Containers wants an automatic email sent to the shipping department listing the products on the opportunity.
How can this requirement be met using a workflow email?

choices.A: Create it on the opportunity using a Visualforce email template.
choices.B: Create it on the opportunity product using a Visualforce email template.
choices.D: Create it on the opportunity using an HTML email template.
choices.C: Create it on the opportunity product using an HTML email template.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
B could cause lookup Skew and result in the same performance issue and not be as functional. C doesn't seem practical. You would need salesforce support for this and they would say no for this reason and direct you to A or archiving records

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks has 300,000 account records and 16 million invoices in a custom object with a master-detail relationship to the Account. Each account record takes a long time to display due to the rendering time of the invoice related list.

What should the consultant do to reduce the amount of time to load the page?

choices.D: Purge the recycling bin to decrease the number of records queried.
choices.C: Enable indexing on all visible fields on the invoice related list.
choices.B: Convert the Invoice object into a lookup relationship.
choices.A: Move the invoice related list to a separate tab on the Lightning page.
